card_text:
(Treated as an Emperor's Fragment card)
If you control an Emperor's Fragment card, you can summon this minion from your hand.

Until the end of your next turn, no minion effects can be used and their effects are negated.
[On Summon]: Choose a Fire minion and become a copy of it.

The activation and effects of this card cannot be negated.

Banish from your board one each of the following The Emperor's minions: Fool, Hound, Knight, Advisor, Wizard and Squire. If you do, summon Demise the Infernal Emperor from your hand, deck, discard pile or banished zone.

If Palace of Inferno in on the field, you can also banish minions from your discard pile for this effect.

If this is in your discard pile, you can return any number of banished Emperor's Fragment cards to your discard pile and if you do, shuffle this card into your deck.
Destroy all minions you control. Summon a Fire minion from your discard pile.

(Treated as an Emperor's Fragment card)
